title: No Blood Moon Elise :(
body:
It makes me sad. That's all I wanted to say. I was excited to see her announced, and every time I play her the little icon teases me in the skin selection.

Please Riot, stop breaking my heart. Don't do me like this.

:'(

replies.body: Riot, like most people in the US, probably had a big part of the last two weeks off and didn't work much on the game.  You know, Christmas Vacation and all that.

I know and your justification makes sense but BLAAAARGH

I wish they hadn't teased it before the vacation.
I get how you are feeling but they needed time to test it out.  Can't be that long now.
